title: Content restrictions using links to Skype sites

tosdr.tldr: You are allowed to link to Skype sites on websites you own (for example your blog) but you will breach the terms of use and risk your account being terminated if content on that site damages Skype's reputation. This could infringe on the ability to write a bad review for example without risking your account.
